scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production vite build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const dir='dist/renderer/assets'; if(fs.existsSync(dir)) { const files=fs.readdirSync(dir).filter(f=>f.startsWith('markdown-')); files.forEach(f => { const file=path.join(dir,f); const content=fs.readFileSync(file,'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(file, content.replace(/require_core\(\)\.Object\.assign/g, 'Object.assign')); console.log('Patched: '+f); }); }"
